title: Trying to find the font for these numbers
content:
I have been looking for the font that these numbers came from and only able to get close. I do not know what the number 4 and 9 look like as they were currently being used by my customer. I need to get as exact as possible on matching this font because the customer needs some numbers replaced. Any help is greatly appreciated. Thank you in advance.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20140725142349im_/http:/typophile.com/files/needed%20number%20font_5305.jpg)

Font: 

 ITC Tiffany STD Heavy 

Solved By: 

 [sunshine7711us](http://web.archive.org/web/20140725142349/http:/typophile.com/user/220975 "View user profile.")

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [needed number font.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20140725142349/http:/typophile.com/files/needed%20number%20font.jpg) | 59.76 KB |
author: Bankswalker

comments.content: I think it's ITC Tiffany Std Heavy.
That is exactly it!!! Thank you sunshine!!!
